title: BLEU (4/4)

definitions.BP: To add a penalty for a candidate whose length is less than the reference
definitions.MEAN_BLEU: The final BLEU score is calculated by multiplying the Brevity Penalty (BP) with the mean BLEU score

formulas: BP = {1 if c > r, e(1-r/c) if c <= r}
c: the length of the candidate
r: the length of the reference
summary: The slide explains the BLEU score calculation, which includes the Brevity Penalty (BP) and the mean BLEU score. The BP is added to a candidate's length if it is less than the reference length, and the final BLEU score is the product of BP and the mean BLEU score.
